UI_TEXT.将整数的输入输出为字符串，将字符串的输入输出为整数: Converts integer input to string output, and string input to integer output.
UI_TEXT.允许用户输入多行文本: Allows users to input multi-line text.
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n本节点会将文本A和文本B结合后写入指定的TXT文件:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
This node combines Text A and Text B and writes them to a specified TXT file. If no path is specified, it will automatically save to the 'zml_w/txt/Text input' folder within the plugin directory.
If the path is a folder, it will write to '文本输入.txt' in that folder, creating the file if it doesn't exist.
You can also specify a TXT file path, but only .txt format is supported. Have fun and a happy day~
UI_TEXT.路径格式不正确，请输入一个文件夹路径或.txt文件路径。: Incorrect path format. Please enter a folder path or a .txt file path.
UI_TEXT.文本为空，没有写入内容。\n文件位置: {abs_path}:
Text is empty, no content written.
File location: {abs_path}
UI_TEXT.从JSON预设文件中加载五个固定分类的文本选项: Loads text options for five fixed categories from a JSON preset file.
UI_TEXT.ZML_PresetText 错误: 无法加载预设文件: {e}: ZML_PresetText Error: Failed to load preset file: {e}
UI_TEXT.JSON文件根目录不是一个字典。: JSON file root is not a dictionary.
UI_TEXT.分类名、预设名称和内容不能为空，且分类名必须是固定类别之一。: Category name, preset name, and content cannot be empty, and category name must be one of the fixed categories.
UI_TEXT.该分类下已存在名为 '{preset_name}' 的预设。: A preset named '{preset_name}' already exists in this category.
UI_TEXT.分类名和预设名称不能为空，且分类名必须是固定类别之一。: Category name and preset name cannot be empty, and category name must be one of the fixed categories.
UI_TEXT.在分类 '{category_name}' 中未找到名为 '{preset_na: Preset named '{preset_name}' not found in category '{category_name}'.
UI_TEXT.你好，很高兴你使用ZML节点，到目前为止，你通过此节点总共转格式了{total_:
Hello, glad you're using ZML Nodes! So far, you've converted images {total_count} times with this node!
If you don't want a title in the converted HTML file, you can choose 'Image-Only Output', which will result in an HTML file containing only the image.
There's a 30-character limit for the title; if exceeded, it won't be written. The additional image is only enabled when 'Image-Only Output' is disabled. It will be displayed to the left of the title. The node will automatically adjust the resolution based on the additional image's aspect ratio. For example, if your additional image is '400*200' and you select a resolution of '200*200', the adjusted size will be '200*100', so choose your additional image resolution carefully~
This node also supports combining images into a GIF. You can use the 'GIF File Path' node to load a GIF and then input it here to convert to HTML~
Alright then~ Wish you a happy life and a happy day~
UI_TEXT.提供两个可自由调节的整数值作为宽和高。: Provides two freely adjustable integer values for width and height.
UI_TEXT.提供固定的宽和高，以及从文本列表中按索引或随机选择的宽和高。: Provides fixed width and height, and also width and height selected by index or randomly from a text list.
UI_TEXT.用英文逗号,分隔多个宽度值: Separate multiple width values with commas
UI_TEXT.用英文逗号,分隔多个高度值: Separate multiple height values with commas
UI_TEXT.你好，欢迎使用ZML节点~\n你可以在预设宽高框里输入你想要的分辨率，然后用英文:
Hello, welcome to ZML Nodes~
You can enter your desired resolutions in the 'Preset Width' and 'Preset Height' boxes, separating them with English commas ','. When the 'Index Value' is '0' or greater than the total number of values in the preset boxes (defaulting to three), the preset width and height outputs will randomly select values from the preset boxes. If the index value does not exceed the total number of preset values, it will output the corresponding width and height based on the index.
When 'Random Aspect Ratio Match' is enabled, width and height use the same index. For example, if the first value in the default preset is randomly chosen, the output will be '832*1216'. If the third value is chosen, it will be '1216*832'. When 'Random Aspect Ratio Match' is disabled, width and height are indexed independently, so you might get '832*832' or '1216*1216'.
That's it~ Simple as that! Thanks for using ZML Nodes, wish you a happy time~
UI_TEXT.根据输入的宽和高的比较结果，从预设列表中输出不同的尺寸和信号值。: Outputs different dimensions and signal values from preset lists based on the comparison of input width and height.
UI_TEXT.按顺序、间隔和范围加载一个整数，并在达到终点时循环。: Loads an integer sequentially, with a step and range, looping when the end is reached.
UI_TEXT.ZML_SequentialIntegerLoader 错误: 无法写入计数文件: ZML_SequentialIntegerLoader Error: Failed to write counter file: {e}
UI_TEXT.提供两个可自由调节的浮点值。: Provides two freely adjustable float values.
UI_TEXT.从预设文件中加载分辨率选项 (名称_宽,高 或 宽,高): Loads resolution options (Name_Width,Height or Width,Height) from a preset file.
UI_TEXT.ZML_PresetResolution 警告: 忽略格式错误的行 (非整数宽高: ZML_PresetResolution Warning: Ignoring malformed line (non-integer width/height): {line}
UI_TEXT.ZML_PresetResolution 错误: 无法加载预设文件: {e}: ZML_PresetResolution Error: Failed to load preset file: {e}
UI_TEXT.宽度和高度不能为空: Width and height cannot be empty
UI_TEXT.宽度和高度必须是整数: Width and height must be integers
UI_TEXT.要删除的预设名称不能为空: Preset name to delete cannot be empty
UI_TEXT.在文件中未找到匹配项: '{display_name}' (原始文件行: '{r: No match found in file for: '{display_name}' (original file line: '{raw_file_string_to_delete}')
